Message:
Plans to create artificial witches
were promptly brought to an end
when one of the experimental
subjects lost control.

The laboratory was destroyed,
and the chief researcher had died.
The project was quickly
shut down thereafter.

However, some of the researchers
had made off with some
leftover materials.

Apparently,
in a previous experiment,
they tried to make
a heartless puppet feel “despair.”

And so, the “experiments”
continued anew,
following the same approach.

When there was nothing left
to break, the body was regenerated,
only to be torn apart again.

After enduring endless,
agonizing pain,
the light slowly faded
from the puppet’s eyes.

And in place of that dark void,
new emotions welled up within.
